mapper.select: SELECT U.*, C.NAME AS CHILD_NAME FROM USER U LEFT JOIN CHILD C ON (U.CHILD_NUM = C.NUM) WHERE U.DEL_YN = 'N' AND AUTH != 'W' AND U.ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uId}, '%') AND U.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uName}, '%') AND U.EMAIL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uEmail}, '%') AND U.TEL_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uTelNo}, '%') AND U.CHILD_NUM IN (SELECT NUM FROM CHILD WHERE NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uChildName}, '%')) AND U.AUTH = #{uAuth} AND U.AUTH = #{uRelation} ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
